text: They had Khloe Kardashian, as well as the rest of their fans,'dreaming'of a romantic reunion. And despite Kourtney Kardashian and Scott Disick's very friendly display at Kylie Jenner's 21st birthday bash on Thursday night, there is'absolutely no way'the former lovebirds will be getting back together.
